meta.description: Determine the number of glass and plastic jars to fill to maximize the total number of bottles filled given honey volume and jar constraints.

sets.name: JARS
sets.description: Types of jars available for filling.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of each type of jar in ml.

params.name: total_honey
params.description: Total amount of honey available in ml.

vars.name: num_jars
vars.description: Number of jars to fill for each type.

objective.name: max_total_jars
objective.description: Maximize the total number of jars filled.

constraints.name: honey_capacity_constraint
constraints.description: Total honey used must not exceed available honey.

constraints.name: plastic_to_glass_ratio
constraints.description: At least twice as many plastic jars as glass jars must be filled.

constraints.name: minimum_glass_jars
constraints.description: At least 20 glass jars must be filled.
